Merge chrome-cordova repo into cca repo

Before this chrome cordova lived in a separate repo and was used by cca as a
git submodule. Merging the repo consisted of the following steps:

== Step 1 - remove submodule (previous commit) ==
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1260748/how-do-i-remove-a-git-submodule

git submodule deinit chrome-cordova
git rm chrome-cordova
git commit

== Step 2 - merge as sub-tree ==
http://nuclearsquid.com/writings/subtree-merging-and-you/

mkdir chrome-cordova
git remote add cr_cdv https://github.com/MobileChromeApps/chrome-cordova.git
git fetch cr_cdv
git merge -s ours --no-commit cr_cdv/master
git read-tree --prefix=chrome-cordova/ -u cr_cdv/master
git commit

== chrome-cordova history ==
git tag ccdv_premerge e34de5fa6c971a9e2b81372eafc529aaa0bc4fa1

The ccdv_premerge tag points to the last head of chrome-cordova repo before
it was merged into cca repo.

When you git log chrome-cordova/README.md, the history will stop at this commit.
In order to see older history use
$ git log ccdv_premerge README.md
note that README.md here comes without the chrome-cordova/ prefix.
i.e. when running from inside chrome-cordova dir, you'll need to use
$ git log ccdv_premerge ../README.md
because at that point in history README.md lived in the root of the repo,
even though it was a different repo.
